attributes.action: Create a BBC education channel available to all!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are sick of useless mind numbing television provided on our standard terrestrials! We often watch the bbc learning zone after midnight and are really struck by the quality of programming; Documentaries, language channels all intrigue us. This is what television should be like. We want a channel everyday, all day deducated to teaching us the ways of the world!!!
